text: (napiye!) Nir kurum; "tanaka irantavaikalaiyum vatiyum irattattaiyum panriyin mamicattaiyum tavira unpavarkal pucikkak kutiyavarril etuvum tatukkappattataka enakku arivikkappattatil nan kanavillai" - enenil ivai niccayamaka acuttamaka irukkinrana. Allatu allah allatavarrin peyar colli arukkappattatu pavamayiruppatanal - (atuvum tatukkappattullatu) - anal evarenum nirppantikkapattu, varampai miramalum pavam ceyya ninaikkamalum pucittuvittal - (avarmitu kurramakatu enenil) niccayamaka unkal iraivan mikka mannipponakavum, perun karunaiyutaiyonumakavum irukkinran
